gobblin.data.management.trash

Class AsyncTrash

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.trash.AsyncTrash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GobblinProxiedTrash, GobblinTrash, Decorator, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class AsyncTrash
extends Object
implements GobblinProxiedTrash, Closeable, Decorator
    Implementation of Trash that deletes files asynchronously and in parallel.

    This implementation is not built through TrashFactory because coder must be aware that the trash implementation is asynchronous. However, internally it uses TrashFactory to instantiate the trash implementation that will actually perform the deletes. This class acts as a Decorator of the inner trash.

    Trash methods will always return true, regardless of success of the actual trash operation. However, additional methods are provided to get a future for the operation.
